name: One More Day
description:
¡Welcome to One More Day!


Embark on an exciting and challenging experience where fashion and survival intertwine in this pixel art 2D game. Confront the dark threat of endless hordes of zombies as you embody a brave hero, equipped only with trusty underwear!

Features


  • Survive the night:
    Face waves of zombies during the dark night and use your strategic skills to stay safe. Can you endure until dawn?

  • Build and reinforce:
    Fix broken doors and construct clever traps to keep the undead at bay. Each construction decision will affect your survival ability, so choose wisely!

  • Trade with shady merchants:
    Interact with merchants of dubious reputation offering essential resources, but at a cost. Are you willing to take risks for survival or trust the shady deals these vendors have for you?

  • Dozens of different weapons:
    From classic shotguns to improvised weapons, discover and use a wide variety of weapons to fend off zombies. Experiment with different strategies and find the perfect combination.

  • Retro Pixel Art style:
    Immerse yourself in a nostalgic world of pixel art that captures the essence of classic 2D games. Every detail is carefully designed to offer a unique visual experience.

Do you have what it takes to face the night in your underwear and emerge as the last survivor? Discover it in One More Day! Get ready for an adventure full of challenges, dangers, and irreverent humor. Every day is one more opportunity for survival!

Survive one more day.
